tasks.name: Database Consultation
tasks.overview: Review project concept and define the most appropriate approach for the database
tasks.visibility: private, you, founding team and contributors
tasks.objective: to determine the best database structure and technology to use
tasks.result: an outline of database structure, required technology options with pros and cons and related technology considerations

tasks.name: Database Design
tasks.overview: Design database architecture for final product
tasks.visibility: private, you, founding team and contributors
tasks.objective: To design the most effective and efficient database
tasks.result: A mapped out database design including hierarchies and dependancies.

tasks.name: Terms of Service
tasks.overview: Write terms of service for the product and digital properties
tasks.type: strategic, business services,legal, tactical, business services, legal
tasks.objective: to write appropriate terms of service for the business and its entities
tasks.result: a completed terms of service fit and ready to be uploaded to our website

tasks.name: Content Marketing Strategy
tasks.objective: to develop our content strategy to drive user growth and awareness
tasks.result: 5 core platforms and appropriate approach for each developed with tactics articulated. Increase user growth by 1000%, awareness by 2000%

tasks.name: Research
tasks.overview: Initial project research - health sector expert
tasks.objective: to help us validate our understanding of the market, sense our assumptions and provide deeper research and insight
tasks.result: 1 Skype meeting (2 hours), 6 hours of research

tasks.name: Prototype Development
tasks.overview: help us build out a first, low fidelity, prototype in angular
tasks.objective: to build a clickable and visual prototype of our suggested solution
tasks.result: 5 page website with 2 types of user pages, a dashboard page, a search page and a add task page
